title: New: Bearcubs – Landslide
body:
This latest single from London’s **Bearcubs** is a real headphone moment.

The second track to be taken from his forthcoming debut LP, _Landslide_ feels somewhere between the late-night glitchy electronica of Mount Kimbie and the more interesting moments of James Blake’s Overgrown. Check it out below, lifted from Ultraviolet, dropping 2 March.

excerpt.full: This latest single from London’s Bearcubs is a real headphone moment. The second track to be taken from his forthcoming debut LP, Landslide feels somewhere between the late-night glitchy electronica of Mount Kimbie and the more interesting moments of James Blake’s Overgrown. Check it out below, lifted from Ultraviolet, dropping 2 March.
excerpt.short: This latest single from London's Bearcubs is a real headphone moment.
